!Emperor Shunaiman: Thank you! Listen closely as I tell you what you need to do. Lilith has blocked access to the Seal by summoning a fire wall, but the fires can be extinguished by this holy water. Once that has been done, there's a red door that you'll need to go through. [Quest _196_SevenSignsSealoftheEmperor shunaiman_q196_1e.htm|"Holy water on the fire, red door."]
